contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Bydel Hundvåg | type = [[Borough]] | image_shield = Stavanger komm.png | image_map = | image_skyline = | latd = 58| latm = 59| lats = 50| latNS = N | longd= 5| longm= 43| longs= 53| longEW= E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_region = NO | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Norway]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of towns and cities in Norway|City]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Stavanger]] | iso_code = [[ISO 3166-2:NO|NO-]] | leader_title = <!-- Governor --> | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 6.41 | area_footnotes = | area_rank = 7th | area_note = | population_as_of = 2007 | population_total = 12,436 | population_footnotes = | population_rank = 7th | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | website = }} '''Hundvåg''' is an island and [[borough]] of the city of [[Stavanger]], [[Norway]]. In addition to the island Hundvåg, other islands are [[Sølyst, Stavanger|Sølyst]], [[Grasholmen]], [[Engøy]], [[Buøy]], [[Bjørnøya, Stavanger|Bjørnøy]], [[Roaldsøy]] and [[Ormøy]]. These islands are connected to mainland Stavanger by the [[Stavanger City Bridge]]. ==Neighbourhoods== Although the borders of neighbourhoods do not correspond exactly to the borough borders, Hundvåg roughly consists of the following neighbourhoods (''delområder''): [[Buøy]] and [[Hundvåg (neighborhood)|Hundvåg]]. ==Politics== Hundvåg has a borough council (''bydelsutvalg''). The council consists of 11 members, with the following [[List of political parties in Norway|party]] allegiance: *3 from the [[Norwegian Labour Party|Labour Party]] (''Arbeiderpartiet'') *1 from the [[Christian Democratic Party of Norway|Christian Democratic Party]] (''Kristelig Folkeparti'') *1 from the [[Liberal Party (Norway)|Liberal Party]] (''Venstre'') *4 from the [[Conservative Party of Norway|Conservative Party]] (''Høyre'') *2 from the [[Progress Party (Norway)|Progress Party]] (''Fremskrittspartiet'') ==References== *[http://www.stavanger.kommune.no/publikum/divsvg.nsf/svgbydeler/1?opendocument Official site] *[http://statistikk.stavanger.kommune.no/Befolkning/42.htm Population and area statistics] {{Boroughs of Stavanger}} [[Category:Boroughs and neighbourhoods of Stavanger]] [[Category:Islands of Rogaland]]
